translations: n.优惠，折价；扣减额（discount 的复数形式）
v.打折扣（discount 的三单形式）；[金融]贴现；低估；漠视

phrs.translation: 打折扣；不受欢迎，没销路
现金收支折现法；贴现现金流

sentences.sentence: Early bird discounts are usually available at the beginning of the season.
sentences.translation: 早到早得的折扣通常在季初有。

sentences.sentence: Trade discounts may be used as a competitive stratagem to secure customer loyalty.
sentences.translation: 商业折扣可以用作保持顾客忠诚度的一种竞争策略。

sentences.sentence: Other prizes include hotel discounts and a time-share at a resort in Palm Springs.
sentences.translation: 其他奖励包括旅馆折扣和棕泉市内一处的度假房分时享用权。
